description: Learn the fundamentals of acoustic guitar, including chords, strumming patterns, and basic music theory. Perfect for absolute beginners. No prior experience needed. Guitars available for rent.
Immersive Spanish conversation practice to build fluency and confidence. We will cover common phrases, cultural nuances, and practical vocabulary for travel and daily life.
A hands-on introduction to Python programming. You'll learn about variables, data types, loops, and functions by building simple applications. Ideal for aspiring developers.
A gentle Vinyasa flow class focused on connecting breath with movement, followed by a guided meditation session to reduce stress and improve focus. All levels are welcome.
Unlock the secrets to baking delicious artisanal bread at home. This workshop covers sourdough starters, kneading techniques, and baking the perfect crusty loaf. Ingredients provided.
Master your DSLR or mirrorless camera. Learn about aperture, shutter speed, ISO, composition, and lighting to take your photos from snapshots to professional-quality images.
One-on-one personal training session tailored to your fitness goals. Whether you want to build muscle, lose weight, or improve your overall health, I will create a personalized plan for you.
Learn the basics of home repair, including fixing leaky faucets, patching drywall, and other common household issues. Gain the confidence to tackle small projects on your own.
Go beyond SUM and AVERAGE. Master pivot tables, VLOOKUP, macros, and data visualization to become an Excel power user.
Experience the therapeutic art of pottery. This beginner's class will guide you through centering clay and throwing basic forms like cylinders and bowls on the potter's wheel.
Conquer your fear of public speaking. Learn techniques for confident delivery, storytelling, and engaging your audience in a supportive and constructive environment.
Unleash your inner author. This workshop explores character development, plot structure, and finding your unique voice through a series of fun and inspiring writing exercises.
Learn to mix, shake, and stir like a pro. This class covers classic cocktails, essential bar tools, and the art of balancing flavors to create your own signature drinks. Must be 21+.
Build your first cross-platform mobile app. This course introduces you to the fundamentals of React Native, from setting up your environment to building UI components and managing state.
Demystify Search Engine Optimization. Learn the basics of keyword research, on-page SEO, and link building to improve your website's visibility on Google.
Learn climbing safety, basic knots, and movement techniques in a controlled indoor environment. A great full-body workout and a fun challenge. Equipment provided.
Go beyond the basic moves. Learn key opening principles, middle-game tactics, and endgame strategies to outwit your opponents. For intermediate players.
Learn the fundamentals of knitting, including how to cast on, knit, purl, and cast off. Create your first scarf in this cozy and relaxing class. Yarn and needles included.
Learn how to grow your own food using organic and sustainable practices. This workshop covers composting, natural pest control, and companion planting for a healthy garden.
Launch your own podcast. This session covers everything from choosing your topic and recording equipment to editing audio and distributing your show to major platforms.
